abstrac: Design and Development of Web, Mobile and Brand Identity
bio:
Fast Growing Design,  IT consulting and offshore programming services company from India that specializes in Design, Web, Mobile and E-Commerce 

Design - Posters, Logos, Banners, Brochures, User Interfaces and Artworks
Web Design - HTML5, CSS3, JQuery, PSD, Template Design
Web Development - PHP, CakePHP, CodeIgniter, Zend
E-Commerce - OpenCart, Magento, WooCommerce
CMS - WordPress, Joomla, Drupal
Mobile - iPhone, iPad and Android

We are always flexible in all terms to satisfy our clients.Payment Method:Based on guru.com directives, all the payments are done through guru.com safepay invoicing and/or escrow only. We would require 50% as setup fee for projects that are less than $400 and would require 35% setup fee for projects that are more than $1000. However, for the project value of more than $2500, we would require a setup fee of 10% against the submission of project plan with technical review whereas the balance be paid on completing each milestones as per the project plan or agreement. We accept payment by SafePay account funds only. Transacting with these Payment Methods is mutually beneficial: We too are saved from the mandatory transaction fees attached to Credit Card and PayPal payments. If the features are added more while the project is on development phase, the cost will be revised based on the time frame or if it may be a 1-3 days of work cost will not be revised

bio:
Welcome to Ohm Creatives!

We are a South Indian team of highly skilled and experienced graphic designers, animators, video editors who were standing on the top class designers of world

Here in GURU's competitive and crowded marketplace, choosing the right freelancer  can be confusing. To help you make a clear and informed decision, here are key reasons why clients worldwide choose us:

QUALITY: Our works are at a world-class standard. Everything is customized using refined skill and the latest technology.

PROFESSIONALISM: We are extremely professional, and focused on providing you with a positive and efficient experience.

CREATIVITY: We are "out-of-the-box" thinkers who brings fresh, creative ideas to the table.

VALUE: Our prices are very attractive. We offer a 100% money-back guarantee and unlimited revisions (within reason).

RESPONSIVENESS: You can expect prompt, rapid response times.

Skype : Niya aravind
